location_notes: Use the machine nameplate for the machine serial (PIN) and record the engine serial from its plate; manuals explicitly instruct recording both.
Use the machine identification/nameplate for the machine serial; also record engine serial when accessible; manuals say 'Do not remove the machine name plate.'
Use the machine nameplate for the serial; record engine serial from the engine type plate where available.
Use the machine nameplate for the machine serial; record engine serial when accessible.
Use the machine nameplate for the machine serial; record engine serial from its plate as recommended.
